IPMS v1.0
  1. Unnamed Package

Uses of Package

  • Classes in Unnamed Package used by Unnamed Package
    Class
    Description
    Application
    Represents an application submitted by a student for an internship opportunity.
    ApplicationService
    Service class for managing internship applications.
    CareerCenterStaff
    Represents a career center staff member who manages company representatives, internship opportunities, and applications.
    CompanyRepresentative
    Represents a company representative who can create and manage internship opportunities.
    IApplicationRepository
    Repository interface for managing internship applications.
    IInternshipRepository
    Repository interface for managing internship opportunities.
    IMenuHandler
    Interface for menu handlers that display and manage user menus.
    InternshipOpportunity
    Represents an internship opportunity created by a company representative.
    InternshipService
    Service class for managing internship opportunities.
    IUserRepository
    Repository interface for managing users.
    Report
    Represents a report of internship opportunities with applied filters.
    ReportManager
    Singleton manager for generating and displaying internship reports.
    Student
    Represents a student user who can apply for internships.
    User
    Abstract base class for all user types in the system.
    UserService
    Service class for managing user operations like login and registration.
